channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead pigeon, 16th September
item.description:
We walked past a clearly dead pigeon so thought best to report it to be removed

item.title: This manhole cover or drain cover on the road is loose and rattles all day and night when cars go over it . It is outside number 76 Friern Barnet lane N11 3NB, 16th September
item.description:
This manhole cover or drain cover on the road is loose and rattles all day and night when cars go over it . It is outside number 76 Friern Barnet lane N11 3NB . It has been reported numerous times now and the problem first started a year ago â€¦

item.title: Plant pots obstructing footpath, 16th September
item.description:
Large plants pots have been placed by someone on footpath in Dublin Avenue. These are blocking all access for pushchairs and wheelchairs on this pavement as well as for people and cars to turn around.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dublin Avenue, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Items, 15th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Market Place, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Bag of laughing gas canisters dumped on pavement, 15th September
item.description:
Bag of large laughing gas canisters dumped on pavement by lampost on Old Perry Street, opposite Bettrington

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Perry Street, Chislehurst, London

item.title: Dangerous height restriction sign, 15th September
item.description:
There is a height restriction sign over the undercroft entrance to Berners Mews from Eastcatle Street. Construction vehicles frequently ignore it and go under, hitting the sign. One of the supporting chains has broken. The others are likely to go in due course. It is over the public highway where people walk and drive. Someone will be injured without urgent action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10-12, Berners Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking drive ways, parking, 15th September
item.description:
This person keeps parking in front of our houses even after being told several times. He comes to this road everyday and parks anywhere

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woodberry Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain causes surface defects on the road, 15th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hampden Avenue, Elmers End, London

item.title: Leaning tree on Cornthwaite Road, 15th September

item.title: Lose manhole cover causing loud bang when driven over, 15th September
item.description:
The manhole cover has become lose from its surrounding and now when it is driven over the movement causes a loud metallic banging sound. Due to high frequency of road use and position on cover near natural driving position this noise is now constant throughout day and night.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Surrey Quays Road, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to brickwork on the northern side of the newly renovated roundabout, 15th September
item.description:
A car must have hit the brickwork making up the edge of the roundabout, as some of the bricks are loose, and may likely fall into the road causing a hazard. Itâ€™s also a shame aesthetically as the roundabout was just modernised.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chinese Roundabout, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
